timeline.message: External links open in new tab

timeline.bodyText: It would be great if we had another option here, but CH and I couldn't come up with one.
timeline.author: s-rubenstein

timeline.bodyText: is there any chance userWorkspace can be null or undefined? should userHasWorkspaces be like userWorkspace && userWorkspaces.length >0 ?
timeline.author: NehaBroad
